definitions.title: breast, better teat, nipple
definitions.body: (titqoi/ Aq Pr 5:19 Symm Ez Eze 23:3, Eze 23:21; NH & Aram. [[דַּד]]; primit. caressing word; acc. to Fl in NHWB:i. 489)—Du. cstr. [[דַּדֵּי]] Ez Eze 23:3, Eze 23:8) both del. LXX SyrVer Co); sf. [[דַּדַּיִח]] Ez Eze 23:21 (rd. [[בתוליך]] SyrVer Co); [[דַּדֶּיהָ]] Pr 5:19; —of breasts of woman Pr 5:19; (Hi Bi rd. [[דּׂדֶיהָ]] her love cf. Pr 7:18); of Samaria & Jerusalem under fig. of young women Ez Eze 23:3 ([[דַּדֵּי בְּתוּלֵיהֶן]]) cf. v:Eze 23:8; [[דַּדַּיִח]] v:Eze 23:21; but prob. del. ´[[ד]] in Ez cf. supr. & Gei:Urachrift 397.—Vid. also [[שַׁד]] sub [[שׁדה]].
